about_the_game:
Pantaloon's Puzzletrunk is an evolving treasure-trove of challenges, riddles and interactive-oddities designed to stimulate that slab of grey-matter nestled behind your eyeballs.

Every month, or thereabouts (keep an eye on the accompanying newsletters for pertinent details), your Puzzletrunk will be updated with a new challenge - and a reward tied to Pantaloon's ongoing mission to put bold and bizarre indie games up on a pedestal. Solve the puzzle, and delight awaits. 

Oh, these puzzles are hard, though. Let's hope you've been looking after that brain of yours. You're going to need it in tip-top shape.

Want to play an early version before release? Join the Pantaloon mailing list for the next Puzzle-drop. 

We partner with developers of bold and bizarre games, and we offer them up as rewards. Solve the puzzle, get glorious games. 

If you're a member of the Pantaloon mailing list already, you'll be familiar with the weird and wayward games we give to our community each month. You might remember we gave away Four Last Things, and Kona, and more recently, Pool Panic. 

Pantaloon's Puzzles require lateral and out-the-box thinking. Often they bleed into the real world; the world of the puzzle blurring with that of reality.

IMPORTANT: To access our monthly puzzles and the rewards for solving them, Pantaloon requires an email log in. Game keys and prizes will always be delivered via our mailing list. Not up for that? That's ok. You can still play as a guest, you'll just have to forgo the reward is all.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Core i3 / AMD A6 2.4Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 260 / AMD Radeon HD 5750. OpenGL 3.3
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Direct X 11.0 compliant video card with 2GB RAM (NVidia GeForce GTX 750 or AMD Radeon HD 7850)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
